actionCalls.name: SendErrorEmailToRenewalOrderContacts
actionCalls.label: Send Error Email to Renewal Order Contacts

actionCalls.description: Calls an action to send an email to the contacts associated with orders that were successfully renewed by the Initiate Renewal action.
actionCalls.name: SendSuccessEmailToRenewalOrderContacts
actionCalls.label: Send Success Email to Renewal Order Contacts

assignments.description: Adds the Account ID of the current record to the AccountsWithExpiringAssetsIds collection variable.
assignments.name: AddAccountIdToCollection
assignments.label: Add Account ID to Collection

assignments.description: Adds the Asset IDs of the current account record to the AssetIdsWithMatchingAccountIds collection variable.
assignments.name: AddAssetIdsWithMatchingAccountIdToCollection
assignments.label: Add Asset IDs with Matching Account ID to Collection

assignments.description: Adds the Asset ID of the current record to the ExpiringAssetIds collection.
assignments.name: AddAssetIdToCollection
assignments.label: Add Asset ID to Collection

assignments.name: AddCreatedOrderIdsToCollection
assignments.label: Add Created Order Ids to Collection

assignments.description: Assign the Faulty Asset Ids into a list from Strings.
assignments.name: AssignCommaSeparatedAssetString
assignments.label: Assign Comma Separated Asset String

assignments.description: Assign the Rest of the Asset IDs in the Faulty Asset Ids
assignments.name: AssignRestAssetIds
assignments.label: Assign Rest Asset Ids

assignments.description: Assign the Last Asset Ids to the Faulty Asset Id
assignments.name: AssignTheLastAssetID
assignments.label: Assign the Last Asset ID

assignments.name: GetGroupingKeyFromAssetRelationship
assignments.label: Get Grouping Key From Asset Relationship

assignments.description: Remove all the faulty asset ids and proceed with the rest.
assignments.name: Remove_Faulty_Asset_Ids
assignments.label: Remove Faulty Asset Ids

assignments.name: RemoveBundledAssetsFromStandaloneAssetCollection
assignments.label: Remove Bundled Assets From Standalone Asset Collection

assignments.description: Will Remove the single Faulty Asset Id.
assignments.name: RemoveFaultyAssetId
assignments.label: Remove Faulty Asset Id

assignments.description: Sets the renewalErrorMessage variable to the value of the error message from the Initiate Renewal action and sets the assetsWithOrderRenewalErrors variable to the value of the getAssetsWithOrderRenewalErrorsIds formula.
assignments.name: SetRenewalErrorVariables
assignments.label: Set Renewal Error Variables

collectionProcessors.description: Filters records from the Assets from GetExpiringAssets record collection with account IDs that match the current account ID. Stores the filtered collection results in the Assets from FilterAssetsWithMatchingAccountId record collection.
collectionProcessors.name: FilterAssetsWithMatchingAccountId
collectionProcessors.label: Filter Assets with Matching Account ID

collectionProcessors.description: Filter the Assets on the Basis of Matching Grouping key to fetch the Asset on the top most asset level.
collectionProcessors.name: FilteredAssetRelationshipsbyGroupingKey
collectionProcessors.label: Filtered Asset Relationships by Grouping Key

collectionProcessors.name: FilteringRootAssetFromAssetRelationship
collectionProcessors.label: Filtering Root Asset From Asset Relationship

collectionProcessors.name: FilterRootAssetsWithAccountId
collectionProcessors.label: Filter Root Assets With Account Id

decisions.name: Check_if_the_Asset_Id_Collection_is_Not_Empty
decisions.label: Check if the Asset Id Collection is Not Empty

decisions.description: Check the number of commas and spilt the string of Faulty Asset Ids One by one to store in the FaultyAssetIDs Collection.
decisions.name: CheckForCommastoSplitTheString
decisions.label: Check For Commas to Split the String

decisions.description: Validate If The Asset IDs String should be single Asset Id or multiple Asset Id. If Single asset id directly remove it from the Asset Id List. If Multiple Asset Ids present will convert the string to list and then remove it from the Asset Id List.
decisions.name: CheckIfErroredAssetIdsIsMultiple
decisions.label: Check if Errored Asset Ids is multiple

decisions.description: Determines whether the AssetId of the current record in the loop exists in the ExpiringAssetIds collection variable.
decisions.name: Have_Asset_ID
decisions.label: Have Asset ID?

decisions.description: Determines whether an error occurred when attempting to activate the renewal order by checking if the orderActivationErrorMessage variable is not empty or null.
decisions.name: Have_Errors
decisions.label: Have Errors?

decisions.description: Determines whether the AccountId of the current record in the loop exists in the AccountsWithExpiringAssetsIds collection variable.
decisions.name: HaveAccountId
decisions.label: Have Account ID?

decisions.description: Determines whether asset records were found by checking if the Assets from GetExpiringAssets record collection is not empty.
decisions.name: HaveAssetRecords
decisions.label: Have Asset Records?

decisions.description: Determines whether assets with renewal order errors were found by checking if the assetsWithOrderRenewalErrorsIds collection is not empty.
decisions.name: HaveAssetsWithRenewalErrorsIDs
decisions.label: Have Assets With Renewal Errors IDs?

decisions.description: Determines whether renewal orders were created by checking if the RenewalOrderIds collection is not empty.
decisions.name: HaveOrderIds
decisions.label: Have Order IDs?

rules.name: Is_Filter_Root_Asset_Collection_Empty
rules.label: Is Filter Root Asset Collection Empty ?

decisions.description: Initiate Retry if the Error Has occurred.
decisions.name: RetryTheActivation
decisions.label: Retry the Activation

loops.description: Looping on the Comma Deli metered Id for Adding multiple Asset IDs In the list of faulty Asset Ids
loops.name: ConvertAssetStringToList
loops.label: Convert Asset String To List

loops.description: Repeats actions for each account ID in the AccountsWithExpiringAssetsIds collection.
loops.name: IterateOverAccountIds
loops.label: Iterate Over Account IDs

loops.description: Repeats actions for each asset relationship record in the AssetRelationships record collection from the GetAssetRelationshipsForExpiringAssets element.
loops.name: IterateOverAssetRelationships
loops.label: Iterate Over Asset Relationships

loops.description: Repeats actions for each asset record in the Assets from GetExpiringAssets record collection.
loops.name: IterateOverAssets
loops.label: Iterate Over Assets

loops.name: IterateOverEachGroupFromTheRelationships
loops.label: Iterate Over Each Group From The Relationships

loops.description: Repeats actions for each asset record in the Assets from FilterAssetsWithMatchingAccountId record collection.
loops.name: IterateOverFilteredAssets
loops.label: Iterate Over Filtered Assets

loops.description: Repeats actions for each asset relationship grouping key to find the root asset Id that will be used to automatically renew
loops.name: IterateOverGroupingKeys
loops.label: Iterate Over Grouping Keys

loops.description: Repeats actions for each order record in the Orders from GetRenewalOrders record collection.
loops.name: IterateOverRenewalOrdersToGetAccountIDs
loops.label: Iterate Over Renewal Orders to Get Account IDs

loops.name: LoopOverFilteredRootAssetRecords
loops.label: Loop over filtered root asset records

recordLookups.description: Gets all the asset records that are enabled for auto renewal and have a LifeCycleEndDate value of today. Stores the results in the Assets from GetExpiringAssets record collection.
recordLookups.name: Get_Expiring_Assets
recordLookups.label: Get Expiring Assets

recordLookups.description: Will Fetch all the Asset Relationships for the Assets on the basis of GroupingKey
recordLookups.name: GetAssetRelationships
recordLookups.label: Get Asset Relationships

recordLookups.description: Gets all the asset relationship records for expiring assets that are enabled for auto renewal and have an AssetRole value of Bundle.
recordLookups.name: GetAssetRelationshipsForExpiringAssets
recordLookups.label: Get Asset Relationships for Expiring Assets

recordLookups.description: Gets all the order records that have an ID in the RenewalOrderIds collection. Stores the results in the Orders from GetRenewalOrders record collection.
recordLookups.name: GetRenewalOrders
recordLookups.label: Get Renewal Orders

textTemplates.description: Will store the email body to be sent when order creation is successful
textTemplates.name: EmailBody
textTemplates.text:
Salesforce auto-renewed assets for account {!IterateOverRenewalOrdersToGetAccountIDs.Account.Name}.


Order ID : {!IterateOverRenewalOrdersToGetAccountIDs.Id}

Order Name : {!IterateOverRenewalOrdersToGetAccountIDs.Name}

Order Date : {!IterateOverRenewalOrdersToGetAccountIDs.EffectiveDate}

Order Total Price : {!IterateOverRenewalOrdersToGetAccountIDs.TotalAmount}


Youre registered as {!$User.FirstName} {!$User.LastName} in {!$Organization.Name} . Need help? Ask Agentforce.

textTemplates.name: EmailBodyError
textTemplates.text:
Salesforce couldnt auto-renew assets for account {!IterateOverRenewalOrdersToGetAccountIDs.Account.Name} because an error occurred.

{!errMsgToSendToEmail}


Youre registered as {!$User.FirstName} {!$User.LastName} in {!$Organization.Name} . Need help? Ask Agentforce

textTemplates.description: Will Store the Email Subject when Order Activation Fails.
textTemplates.name: EmailSubjectFailure
textTemplates.text: Salesforce couldnt activate order {!IterateOverRenewalOrdersToGetAccountIDs.OrderNumber} for account {!IterateOverRenewalOrdersToGetAccountIDs.Account.Name}.

textTemplates.description: Will Store the Subject Email Details when the Order Activation was Successful
textTemplates.name: EmailSubjectSuccess
textTemplates.text: Salesforce order {!IterateOverRenewalOrdersToGetAccountIDs.OrderNumber} for account {!IterateOverRenewalOrdersToGetAccountIDs.Account.Name} was activated.

variables.description: Will Store the Collection of Unique Account IDs
variables.name: AccountsWithExpiringAssetsIds

variables.description: Stores a collection of IDs for assets associated with accounts that have account IDs in the AccountsWithExpiringAssetsIds collection variable.
variables.name: AssetIdsWithMatchingAccountIds

variables.description: Stores the Asset Relationship unique grouping key.
variables.name: AssetRelationshipGroupingKey

variables.description: store the collection of unique asset id's
variables.name: ExpiringAssetIds

variables.description: No of Days for fetching the Asset on the basis of LifeCycleEndDate
variables.name: NoOfDaysInFuture

variables.description: Set the Output type to Order so that Order IDs will be created.
variables.name: OutputType

variables.description: Stores a collection of IDs for assets that have relationships to the expiring assets in the Assets from GetExpiringAssets record collection.
variables.name: RelatedAssetIds

variables.description: Stores the error message from the Initiate Renewal action.
variables.name: renewalErrorMessage

waits.description: Wait for Order Activation for 2 minutes.
waits.name: WaitForOrderActivation
waits.label: Wait for Order Activation
